name: Flame Fiasco!
description:
You're small and you can't put out the flames by yourself, use the fire extinguisher and escape from the burning house before burning to death.

-------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

  • To Move:  A, D
  • To start the game: SPACE
  • To restart: Click on button

TEAM

  • Valquiria Geib (KGeib)
    • Game Designer
    • Sound Designer
  • Camila Ribeiro (Enchantrelle)
    • Artist
  • André Gugelmin
    • Programmer
    • Vfx designer

-------------------------------------------------------

Sound of fire taked from freesound: Freesound - "Fire Auto - car on fire" by florianreichelt

Sound of boy dying taked from youtube: Scream Sound Effect - YouTube
and edited a little on Audacity.

-------------------------------------------------------
